metadata.title: CVE-2019-2110 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In ScreenRotationAnimation of ScreenRotationAnimation.java, there is apossible capture of a secure screen due to a missing permission check. Thiscould lead to local information disclosure with no additional executionprivileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product:AndroidVersions: Android-9Android ID: A-69703445

criterions.comment: android-framework-23: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
